name: Tower of the Unknown
description:
Take a leap into the unknown and delve into this whimsical tower of madness. Find the exit on each floor but be warned; The rules of this tower can change at any point.

This game was made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam of 2020 with the theme "Out of Control". It was made in Unreal Engine by 4 people

Rosario Baarh - https://twitter.com/RosarioBaarh
Floyd Krielaart -  https://twitter.com/FloydDesigner & https://floydkrielaart.weebly.com/
Adriaan Scheepers - https://twitter.com/Adca_Dev & https://www.adriaanscheepers.com/
Stefano De Petris - https://twitter.com/dp_stefano & https://stefanodpc.wixsite.com/website
